content_html: Brazil's former president, Jair Bolsonaro, has been found guilty by the country's supreme court. The court's majority decision on Thursday convicted him of a serious crime: plotting to stay in power after he lost the 2022 election. The court has sentenced him to more than 27 years in prison.

summary: Brazil's former president, Jair Bolsonaro, has been found guilty by the country's supreme court. title: Former Brazilian President Bolsonaro Found Guilty
